page.title: 18SPROATLEY ENDOWED SCHOOL
page.content: There are 210 pupils at Sproatley Endowed School. The children are aged 5 to 11. There are 7 classes in the school. We have our playtimes at 10.30 to 10.45,12.30 to 1.15 and 2.30 to 2.45.We have dinner at 12.00.Some pupils don't come from Sproatley. They come from New Ellerby,Old Ellerby,West Newton,Flinton,Humbleton and Wyton. They have to come by buses to school. The teachers at Sproatley school are called Mrs.Broddle,Miss.Perkins,Miss. Moxon,Mrs.Hind,Mrs.Taylor,Mrs.Bird, Mrs.Keen,Mr.Crabb,Mrs.Gale,Mrs.Stott and the headmaster is Mr.Stott.We have an assembly at 10.15.We have a big field and two playgrounds.Class Six are in the Portacabin next to the school.The school is at the south-east end of the village and looks out from under the shadow of the church at open fields in the distance.
